isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 MODEL - LIGHT SYSTEMS - DESCRIPTION - Cab Dome, Reading, and Courtesy Lights

svcproc.title: Cab Dome, Reading, and Courtesy Lights
svcproc.para: The left and right dome and courtesy lights provide light when they are switched on at the dome light switch, or when the cab doors are opened and the dome light switch is set for automatic operation. Thus the driver is able to fill out log books, etc., and enter and exit the cab safely after dark. The left and right reading lights are controlled individually by a switch at each lamp.
